content.rendered:
Privacy Policy

About Saaras Impact Foundation

Saaras Impact Foundation is registered non-profit based in India.

Operating Address
Saaras Impact Foundation
First floor, Sector 18/225,
Munshi Pulia, Sitapur Road
Near Premium Diagnosis Center,
Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh
India – 226016

Head Office
Bapu G – 7,
Near Badarpur Metro Station,
Badarpur,
Delhi, New Delhi,
India – 110044

Digital Addresses
1. saaras.org
2. saarasimpact.org

Data Collection, Usage & Rights

Contact Forms
Data submitted via any contact forms is retained indefinitely. Please refer to rights over data section below for more information.

Embedded Content
Embedded content, i.e. videos, images, articles, etc. from other websites behave in the exact same way as if you have visited the other website. These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics
We collect anonymous user data to improve customer experience across all our websites, platforms and social media channels.

Data Retention
We retain data indefinitely, and/or as required by the law.

Rights over Data
You may request to receive an exported file of the data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.
If at any time you wish to obtain or destroy the information we store about you, you may drop us an email at legal@brewing.studio with the subject “Data Erasure Request”.
Note: Anonymously collected data by nature cannot be erased.
